LanguageData.MM_Namaritake.label: Namaritake
LanguageData.MM_Namaritake.description: Heavy metal mushrooms that grow in cars. It doesn't matter what you see or how heavy it is, so wash your car regularly and pick it up. \n By the way, since it is a metal, it cannot be eaten, but it can be reduced to a small amount of iron by refining.
